DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine acute chronic [ 4-week ] effect high-DHA fish oil supplement fast post-prandial ( post-meal ) biomarkers cardiovascular disease risk , adult Statin therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Assess High-DHA Fish Oil Biomarkers Cardiovascular Disease Risk Adults Statin Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: This study involve fast post-prandial component . Fasted Study : Participants provide fast blood sample pre-and post-intervention [ 4-week administration supplement placebo ] Treatment Period I . Participants provide fast blood sample pre-and post-intervention [ 4-week administration supplement placebo , opposite Treatment Period I ] Treatment Period II . There 4-week washout period two Treatment Periods . Post-prandial study : Participants also complete post-prandial study pre-and post-intervention Treatment Period .
DOC.criteria: Be adult age 18 70 ; Be male postmenopausal female go minimum one year since last menses ; Be take Statin medication stable dose minimum four week prior study commencement [ reach target LDL level ] ; Have elevate fast triglyceride level [ great 1.5 mmol/L less 5.7 mmol/L ] ; Have fast blood glucose level study cutoff [ le 7.0 mmol/L ] ; Have Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less 35.0 Be take natural health product BUT agree cease consumption study period 4week prestudy washout prior study commencement . Study participant allow consume daily multivitamin stable dose minimum three month prior study commencement . Be young 18 year age old 70 year age ; Be adult pre perimenopausal female ; Not take Statin medication stable dose minimum 4 week prior study commencement ; Have fast triglyceride level outside study limit [ ie/ le 1.5 mmol/L great 5.7 mmol/L ] ; Have elevate fast blood glucose level [ great equal 7.0 mmol/L ] ; Have high blood pressure [ great 140/100 ] Have Body Mass Index ( BMI ) equal great 35.0 Have preexist cardiovascular disease illness , include angina , myocardial infarction , stroke , intermittent claudication transient ischemic attack ; Have know allergy fish and/or fish oil , olive oil , soy Vitamin E ; Be take natural health product unwilling cease consumption study period 4week prestudy washout prior study commencement ; Consume two ( 2 ) fish meal weekly basis Consume excessive amount alcohol weekly basis [ 10 alcoholic drink per week ] ; Anticipate plan surgery course study .
